document.full_text: the fiesta bowl is seeking the return of thousands of dollars in campaign contributions made to u.s. sens. john mccain and jon kyl, and other arizona politicians, according to documents.
document.title: fiesta bowl wants campaign cash back
lines_and_colors: the fiesta bowl is seeking the return of thousands of dollars in campaign contributions made to u.s. sens. john mccain and jon kyl, and other arizona politicians, according to documents.
